name: Revlon Gold Series Eye Lash Curler, Creates Open Eye Look, Easy to Use, Titanium-Coated for Durability, 1 Count

Flat cradle allows you to get closer to the lash line for a bombshell curl and it creates a 125% more lifted lash look. Can be used by itself or along with mascara (not included). name: JAPONESQUE Comfort Grip Eyelash Curler for Natural & False Lashes, Universal Fit, Long-Lasting Curl
short_description: LASH LIFTING & CURLING: Designed with a natural-arch, contoured shape and a soft lash pad, this curler creates deep, dramatic curls that open up the eyes. Ideal for all eye shapes, it enhances lash definition for a lifted, wide-awake look.

BIG LASHES, BIG IMPACT: The extra-wide opening fits longer lashes, perfect for curling false lashes, extensions, or natural lashes. This curler creates a striking, voluminous effect that makes lashes appear longer and fuller.

EASY TO USE FOR LASTING CURLS: The comfort grip handle ensures an easy, secure hold. Always curl before mascara by positioning the curler at the lash base, gently squeezing, and releasing for long-lasting lift.
INCLUDES REPLACEMENT PADS: Comes with 1 extra lash pad, ensuring smooth and consistent curling. Keep your tool in top shape for flawless lashes anytime.
PROFESSIONAL BEAUTY TOOLS: JAPONESQUE delivers high-performance beauty tools inspired by professional services, providing salon-quality results in the comfort of your home.

name: JAPONESQUE Extreme Lash Curler - Scissor Comfort Handle, Deep Curl, Keeps Lashes Curled for 8 Hours, High Arch Design, for Natural or False Lashes, Includes 1 Refill Pad (Gunmetal)
short_description: High arch creates a dramatic sweeping curl​. Deep curve hugs rounder eyes & grabs every lashes​. Wider curling surface fits larger eyes or long lash lines​.

Up to 8 Hours of Curl: Soft lash pad creates a long-lasting curl. Soft lash pad is gentle enough for both natural & false lashes. For even more impact, apply mascara and use our Lash Separator to define lashes and lock-in your curl.
Customized To Your Eye Shape: Our eyelash curlers feature different arches, widths and angles so you can find just the right curler for your unique eye shape.

Best Use: Before you apply anything to your lashes is when you should use your eyelash curler. Mascara makes your lashes stick to the tool. Center your open curler along the lash line and make sure it’s positioned so that all your lashes get the lifting benefits. Gently squeeze your eyelash curler so that it doesn’t cause any damage to the lid or lashes. Open to reveal curled and lifted lashes.
​Perfect for: Round Eyes, Large Eyes, Long Lash Lines​.

name: Panasonic Heated Eyelash Curler Comb With Non-Stick Silicone, Wand-Style - EH2351AC
short_description: Panasonic heated eyelash curler provides long lasting curl in seconds with gentle, evenly applied heat along the entire length of the lash
Durable, circular lash curler comb separates, curls and styles lashes from base to tip without crimping or pinching. Operating time approx. 21 uses (2 min./ 1 usage)
Sleek, contoured heated eyelashes curler design fits naturally in either hand for maximum comfort and ease of use
Stylish heated lash curler styles and beautifies with or without mascara for the results you desire; Eyelash curler comb rinses clean under warm running water
Compact, portable heated electric lash curler and cap slip neatly into purse, bag or makeup case for quick, easy touch ups away from home; Powered with 1 AA size battery (not included)
product_description: The sleek Panasonic EH2351AC Heated Eyelash Curler for women is the best heated eyelash curler, and the quick, easy way to curl and style lashes. Using a gently heated, circular comb, this electric eyelash curler safely lifts and lengthens even the straightest lashes in seconds, without pinching or squeezing. A convenient lash curler indicator changes from purple to pink when the curler is heated and ready to use. The Panasonic eyelash curler's contoured profile fits naturally in the hand for total comfort and control. And with this heated eyelashes curler you can comfortably curl and style with or without mascara. To clean, simply hold the lash curler comb head under warm, running water to rinse away mascara. A handy brush is included for quick, on-the-spot eyelash curler maintenance. This slim, versatile lash curler is also designed for maximum portability, and both eyelash curler and cap can be neatly slipped into a purse, bag or makeup case for quick, easy touch-ups at the office, gym or while travelling. The Panasonic EH2351AC Heated Eyelash Curler with Comb Design includes a protective cap and is powered by one AA-size battery (not included).

【High-Quality Carbon Steel & Gentle Silicone Pad】Crafted from durable carbon steel and a soft silicone pad, our lash curler curls your eyelashes smoothly within seconds. The pad protects your lashes while providing a clump-free, natural-looking lift.

【All-in-One Makeup Tool Set】This set includes everything you need: an eyelash curler, false eyelash tweezers, an eyebrow tweezers, and a multi-purpose eyebrow brush, plus 6 replacement silicone pads. From brows to lashes, it’s your perfect companion for a full makeup routine.

【Portable, Stylish & Ideal as a Gift】Sleek and easy to carry, this eyelash curler is a must-have makeup tool for travel and daily use. Its elegant appearance and practical design also make it a perfect gift choice for any makeup lover.
